solution_line_template: If the ship traveled {distance_north_day1} miles to the north, it sailed for a distance of {multiplier_east_day2} * {distance_north_day1} miles = {distance_east_day2} miles to the east on the second day.
On the third day, the sheep sailed for {distance_east_day2} miles + {additional_east_day3} miles = <<{distance_east_day2}+{additional_east_day3}={distance_east_day3}>>{distance_east_day3} miles.

The distance covered by the ship in the three days is {distance_east_day3} miles + {distance_east_day2} miles + {distance_north_day1} miles = <<{distance_east_day3}+{distance_east_day2}+{distance_north_day1}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} miles
